div.p: Packed full of products and useful information, our catalog is a fantastic resource for every ceramicist. There are 3 ways to obtain the catalog. Check out the options below!

em.strong: We publish our catalog every two years, so our next one will come out in 2021.

div.class: bg-light px-3 py-4 h-100 d-flex flex-column
div.p: Click the button below to view the catalog. Add it to your cart and we'll send you a print copy at no charge!

div.class: bg-light px-3 py-4 h-100 d-flex flex-column
div.p: Want the catalog in hand to peruse before you buy anything? Buy it now for $15 and we will send you a $10 coupon that can go toward your next purchase!

div.class: bg-light px-3 py-4 h-100 d-flex flex-column
div.p: Download the catalog and have access to all the content in a digital format. Want single pages? Scroll down to find the specific pages you are looking for.

Which clays are best for which uses?
See pages 2, 4 & 6

What's the best way to test my slip?
See page 11

I want to try something new with my glazes.
See alternative firing schedules on page 19

Got anything new for raku?
Try Duncan lowfire glazes with raku glazes! See page 35

My glazes froze solid! Now what do I do?
They'll be fine: see page 34

How much surface area does a 4-ounce jar of glaze cover?
About two square feet: see page 34

What are Mason stains for? How do I use them?
Oh, all the possibilities! See page 84

I make my own glaze, and I need a chemical analysis on Fusion frits.
We know what that is, and we have it for you: see page 89

em.strong: Click on the pictures to download and print the ones you want!

h6.em: All Georgies' deliveries are subject to change based on weather conditions. Salem and Seattle delivery routes may be rescheduled based on low demand or high demand for deliveries in other areas.

div.p:
Portland metro area: Monday, Tuesday & Friday of each week
Salem area: every Wednesday
Seattle area: every other Thursday

Delivery charges to Portland and Salem areas:
$40.00 up to 2,000 pounds. $60 for deliveries over 2,000 pounds.

Delivery charge to the Eugene area (from Portland):
$60. Fuel surcharges may apply on deliveries from Portland, depending on market factors.

Bend area: We make deliveries from Portland to Bend on the last Friday of each month, weather permitting. For best results, please place your orders on or before the last Monday of each month. We can accept add-on and last-minute orders through the last Wednesday (2 days before the delivery date). Order weight or space allocations may be limited by the capacity of our delivery vehicle. Ross delivers to a central location in Bend, and will be happy to help unload and move your order into your vehicle(s).

Orders up to 500 pounds = $45.00 delivery charge.
Orders 501 to 2000 pounds = $75.00 delivery charge.

h6.em: We know that many people can't receive deliveries during the week because of your own work schedules. Deliveries from Portland on Saturday or Sunday are possible with arrangements made in advance. We need at least 10 to 14 days lead time for weekend deliveries, please.

div.div:
Click on a state to find your closest Georgies distributor.Listed below are Georgies distributors by state.
Canadian Distributors are listed at the bottom of the page.

div.class: px-2 pl-md-0 pr-md-2 pr-lg-3 py-5 li-split-background-item
div.p: We send email newsletters every month to over 9,000 ceramic artists and hobbyists across the U.S. Each newsletter has the latest products, greatest ideas or projects, and what's coming up at our stores in Portland and Eugene. We'll alert you to sales and specials, which artists display their work in our gallery space, class schedules, and more. Use the form below to sign up for our email news.

em.strong: We have completely discontinued our printed newsletters. We've found that we can send updates and news every month at far less cost than mailing paper, and it helps preserve our natural resources.

div.class: px-2 pr-md-0 pl-md-2 pl-lg-3 py-5 li-split-background-item

p.strong: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

div.div: Serving sculpture and ceramic artists in the Pacific Northwest and beyond since 1965

div.class: px-2 pl-md-0 pr-md-2 pr-lg-3 py-5 li-split-background-item

p.strong:
Call the Portland store at :
503.283.1353 or 800.999.2529

Call the Eugene store at:
541.338.7654 or 866.234.2529

div.p: To send us your questions, comments or suggestions, please use the following form. We ask for your phone number only because sometimes it's easier and faster to discuss technical clay, glaze, or equipment questions over the phone rather than email. In that case we'll call you (at no charge to you for long-distance calls).

p.strong: Please note: we reply to most email questions within one or two business days (Monday through Friday). Our offices are closed on Saturdays and Sundays.

div.p: Questions about equipment, raw materials, glaze chemistry, or other more complex subjects may take longer, depending on how long we need to find the answers for you.

Whoops!
We can't find that page!
div.p: Please head back Home or use the navigation bar above to explore the site.
If you feel that you reached this page in error, and that there should be something other than this here, please reach out to us via our contact page.
